item.description:
Outside the Scope... is one of several catch-all entries in the Admin: Miscellaneous Placeholder family. This entry represents items that are not board games in the sense defined by BoardGameGeek. These include:


 OUTDOOR DEXTERITY OR 'SPORTING GOODS' GAMES
 Bocce
 Cornhole
 Croquet
 Disc Golf
 Horseshoes
 Jarts
 Kubb 
 Mölkky
 Pétanque (Boules)
 Roller Dice
 Spin Ladder
 Throw Throw Burrito (Outdoor versions)
 



 SOME INDOOR DEXTERITY OR 'SPORTING GOODS' GAMES
 Air Hockey
 Billiards
 Darts
 Foosball
 Nerf Golf
 Table Hockey
 Table Tennis
 



 SOLO PUZZLES
 Ant Trails
 Block by Block
 Blokus Puzzle
 Brick by Brick
 Brains: Japanese Garden
 Camelot Jr.
 Catan Logic Puzzle
 Cat Crimes (ThinkFun)
 Cat Stax / GattoMatto
 Clue Suspects
 Code Master: Programming Logic Game
 Colorplay
 Dog Crimes (ThinkFun)
 Dragonflies
 Filled Stairs
 Flip Side Game
 Flying Hex
 Gadeiro
 Hi-Q
 Hoppers
 IQ Fit (Smart Games)
 Izzi
 Kakuro
 Laser Maze (ThinkFun)
 Leapin' Lizards
 Logic Links
 Logiquest: Ticket to Ride
 Lunar Lockout
 M.A.R.I. and the Crazy Factory
 Match'Em Up
 Nodus
 Q-Less
 Penta
 River Crossing
 Rush Hour 
 Roller Coaster Challenge
 Shadow Glyphs
 Shape by Shape
 Solitaire Chess
 Spider-Man City Crossing
 Square by Square
 Square Root
 Subtrax
 Sudoku
 Tangrams
 Transmission
 Trip 1907: Interactive Escape The Book Game
 Tantrix (solo-only versions)
 That-A-Way
 Ticket to Ride: Track Switcher
 Tip Over
 Trifolia
 Turing Tumble
 



 VIDEO ONLY GAMES WITHOUT BOARDS OR CARDS:
 Deal or No Deal DVD Game
 Deal or No Deal and Who Wants to Be a Millionaire Combo DVD Game
 Derby Day DVD Game
 E Pop!-A-Razzi DVD Game
 Frogger DVD Game
 Let's Make a Deal DVD Game
 Press Your Luck DVD Game
 Pirates of the Caribbean DVD Treasure Hunt
 Shrek Bingo DVD Game
 Singing Bee DVD Game
 Sudoku DVD Game
 Who Wants To Be a Millionaire DVD Game
 Would You Rather DVD Game 
 



 STRUCTURED ACTIVITIES (Games without a win condition)
 Pete the Cat: The Missing Cupcakes Game
 Pete the Cat: The Wheels on the Bus Game
 Acorn Soup (Peaceable Kingdom)
 Honey (Move38)
 Prediction Rod (Parker Brothers)
 



 OTHER
 Ravensburger's "Escape Puzzle" Series (Space Observatory, Forbidden Basement, Curse of the Wolves, The Unicorn, Submarine, Vampire's Castle, Witches Kitchen, Curse of the Wolves, Dragon, The Toy Factory)
 KOSMOS' EXIT: Das Buch Series
 EXITUS (Sealed Book Project)
 


ROLE PLAYING GAMES are to be added on RPGGeek
VIDEO AND ELECTRONIC GAMES are to be added on Video Game Geek

See also:
BGG Guide to Game Submissions
Game Criteria

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

link.value: Admin: Outside the Scope of BGG
